foreignData.name: Svogthos, das ruhelose Grab
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{3}{B}{G}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird Svogthos, das ruhelose Grab, zu einer schwarzen und grünen Pflanzen- und Zombie-Kreatur mit „Stärke und Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur sind gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten auf deinem Friedhof." Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignData.name: Svogthos, la tumba inquieta
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{3}{B}{G}: Hasta el final del turno, Svogthos, la tumba inquieta es una criatura Planta Zombie verde y negra con "Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia de esta criatura son iguales al número de cartas de criatura que haya en tu cementerio". Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignData.name: Svogthos, le Tombeau agité
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{3}{B}{G} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, Svogthos, le Tombeau agité devient une créature noire et verte Plante et Zombie avec « Cette créature a une force et une endurance chacune égale au nombre de cartes de créature dans votre cimetière. » C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignData.name: Svogthos, la Tomba Inquieta
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{3}{B}{G}: Fino alla fine del turno, Svogthos, la Tomba Inquieta diventa una creatura Zombie Pianta nera e verde con "La forza e la costituzione di questa creatura sono pari ciascuna al numero di carte creatura presenti nel tuo cimitero." È ancora una terra.

foreignData.name: 安息の無い墓、スヴォグトース
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{3}{B}{G}：ターン終了時まで、安息の無い墓、スヴォグトースは「このクリーチャーのパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードの枚数に等しい」の能力を持つ黒であり緑である植物・ゾンビ・クリーチャーになる。それは土地でもある。

foreignData.name: Svogthos, a Tumba Insone
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adiciona {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{3}{B}{G}: Até o final do turno, Svogthos, a Tumba Insone, se torna uma criatura Zumbi Planta preta e verde com "O poder e a resistência desta criatura são iguais ao número de cards de criaturas em seu cemitério." Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreignData.name: Свогтос, неупокоенная могила
foreignData.text:
{T}: Добавьте {1} в запас маны.
{3}{B}{G}: До конца хода Свогтос, неупокоенная могила, становится зеленым и черным существом Растение Зомби со свойством "Сила и здоровье равняются числу карт существ на вашем кладбище". При этом она остается землей.

foreignData.name: 不息之墓苏沃索
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{3}{B}{G}：直到回合结束，不息之墓苏沃索成为既是黑色也是绿色的植物／灵俑生物，并具有「此生物的力量与防御力各等同于你坟墓场中生物牌的数量。」它仍然是地。

name: Svogthos, the Restless Tomb
originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

rulings.text: While animated, Svogthos’s power and toughness changes each time a creature card enters or leaves its controller’s graveyard.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.
